description: This lightened up lemon and herb take on coleslaw proves how versatile brussels sprouts can be.
keywords: Coleslaw,Pescatarian,Brussels sprout,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Greek Yoghurt Brussels Sprout Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lemon, juiced and 1 tsp of zest

recipeInstructions.text: In a large mixing bowl, whisk the yoghurt, mayonnaise, lemon juice and zest, chopped dill and black pepper.
Tip in the shredded brussels sprouts and spring onions and toss well to coat. Leave to sit for 20 minutes and serve.
